alert.note: Alert for Wapello (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 7:37PM CDT until June 21 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wapello County in southeastern Iowa... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 737 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ottumwa Industrial Airport, or near Ottumwa, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Agency around 755 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Eldon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
